description: Short quizzes at the start of each lab on lecture content related to the lab activity. Best 7 of 8 quizzes are counted.
8 lab experiments with pre-lab quizzes (safety and lab info) and written reports submitted one week post-lab. Best 7 of 8 labs counted. Includes attendance hurdle (minimum 7 labs).
Two restricted-note tests (1 hour each) covering course topics. Test 1 in Week 5, Test 2 in Week 9. Includes short/long answers, data interpretation, calculations, and drawing.
2-hour exam covering all course topics and lab content. Includes multi-step questions, data interpretation, calculations, and written answers. Requires 35% minimum to pass.
